00033         typedef struct _OMax_render 
00034         {
00035                 t_object        ob;                     
00036                 t_symbol*       oname;          
00037                 t_symbol*       dataname;       
00038                 bool            obound;         
00039                 O_DataType      datatype;       
00040                 int                     nbcoeffs;       
00041                 O_data*         data;           
00042                 t_atom*         twout;          
00043                 t_atom*         coefout;

00045                 float*          coeftab;

00047                 void*           out_buf;        
00048                 void*           out_sectphr;
00049                 void*           out_data;       
00050                 void*           out_bang;       
00051         } t_OMax_render;

00080         int C74_EXPORT main(void)
00081         {       
00082                 t_class *c;
00083                 
00084                 c = class_new("OMax.render", (method)OMax_render_new, (method)OMax_render_free, (long)sizeof(t_OMax_render), 
00085                                           0L /* leave NULL!! */, A_GIMME, 0);
00086                 
00087                 // assistance
00088                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_render_assist,"assist",A_CANT, 0); 
00089                 
00090                 // input methods
00091                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_render_read,"int", A_LONG, 0);
00092                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_render_setname, "set", A_DEFSYM, 0);
00093                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_render_phrases, "phrases",0);
00094                 
00095                 class_register(CLASS_BOX, c); /* CLASS_NOBOX */
00096                 OMax_render_class = c;
00097                 
00098                 return 0;
00099         }

00106         void *OMax_render_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00107         {
00108                 t_OMax_render *x = NULL;
00109                 
00110                 if ((x = (t_OMax_render *)object_alloc(OMax_render_class)))
00111                 {
00112                         // allocation
00113                         char err;
00114                         long i = 0;
00115                         atom_alloc_array(2, &i, &x->twout, &err);
00116                         if (!err || i!=2)
00117                                 object_error((t_object*)x, "Allocation error");
00118                         
00119                         x->coefout = NULL;
00120                         x->coeflist = NULL;
00121                         x->coeftab = NULL;
00122                         
00123                         // outlet init
00124                         x->out_statenb = intout(x); // rightmost
00125                         x->out_buf = listout(x);
00126                         x->out_sectphr = listout(x);
00127                         x->out_data = outlet_new(x,NULL);
00128                         x->out_bang= bangout(x);
00129                         
00131                         x->obound = FALSE;
00132                         if (argc == 0)
00133                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Missing name of the Oracle data to read");
00134                         else
00135                         {
00136                                 if (argv->a_type != A_SYM)
00137                                         object_error((t_object *)x,"First argument must be a symbol (name of an existing Oracle)");
00138                                 else
00139                                         x->oname = atom_getsym(argv);
00140                         }
00141                         
00142                         // color
00143                         t_object *box;
00144                         t_jrgba colorvals;
00145                         jrgba_set(&colorvals, 0.30, 1.0, 0.15, 1.0);
00146                         object_obex_lookup((t_object *)x, gensym("#B"), &box);
00147                         jbox_set_color(box, &colorvals);
00148                 }
00149                 return (x);
00150         }
00151         
00154         void OMax_render_free(t_OMax_render *x)
00155         {
00156                 sysmem_freeptr(x->twout);
00157                 if (x->coefout)
00158                         sysmem_freeptr(x->coefout);
00159                 if (x->coeflist)
00160                         delete x->coeflist;
00161                 if (x->coeftab)
00162                         free(x->coeftab);
00163         }
00164         
00167         void OMax_render_assist(t_OMax_render *x, void *b, long io, long index, char *s)
00168         {
00169                 switch (io)
00170                 {
00171             case 1: // inlets
00172                                 switch (index)
00173                         {
00174                                 case 0: // leftmost
00175                                         sprintf(s, "state to read, set [symbol] changes sequence to read");
00176                                         break;
00177                         }
00178                 break;
00179             case 2: // outlets
00180                                 switch (index)
00181                         {
00182                                 case 0:
00183                                         sprintf(s, "bang when done");
00184                                         break;
00185                                 case 1: // leftmost
00186                                         sprintf(s, "data");
00187                                         break;
00188                                 case 2:
00189                                         sprintf(s, "section & phrase");
00190                                         break;
00191                                 case 3:
00192                                         sprintf(s, "buffer date & duration");
00193                                         break;
00194                                 case 4:
00195                                         sprintf(s, "state number");
00196                                         break;
00197                         }
00198                                 break;
00199                 }
00200         }

00209         t_symbol * OMax_render_name(t_symbol * oname)
00210         {
00211                 char dataname[128];
00212                 strcpy(dataname,oname->s_name);
00214                 strcat(dataname,"_data");
00215                 return gensym(dataname);
00216         }
00217         
00220         bool OMax_render_bind(t_OMax_render *x)
00221         {
00223                 if (x->obound == FALSE)
00224                 {
00226                         x->dataname = OMax_render_name(x->oname);
00227                         if ((x->dataname->s_thing) && (ob_sym(x->dataname->s_thing) == gensym("OMax.data")))
00228                         {
00229                                 x->data = &(((t_OMax_data*)(x->dataname->s_thing))->data);
00230                                 // If binding is ok, then don't do it next time.
00231                                 x->obound = TRUE;
00233                                 x->datatype = ((t_OMax_data*)(x->dataname->s_thing))->datatype;
00234                                 if (x->datatype == SPECTRAL) // allocate memory for the output
00235                                 {
00236                                         x->nbcoeffs = ((t_OMax_data*)(x->dataname->s_thing))->nbcoeffs;
00237                                         // allocation for coeff output
00238                                         x->coeflist = new list<float>(x->nbcoeffs);
00239                                         x->coeftab = (float*)malloc((x->nbcoeffs)*sizeof(float));
00240                                         char err;
00241                                         long i = 0;
00242                                         atom_alloc_array(x->nbcoeffs, &i, &x->coefout, &err);
00243                                         if (!err || i!=x->nbcoeffs)
00244                                                 object_error((t_object*)x, "Allocation error");
00245                                 }
00246                                 if (x->datatype == MIDI_POLY) // allocate memory for the output
00247                                 {
00248                                         char err;
00249                                         long i = 0;
00250                                         atom_alloc_array(6, &i, &x->coefout, &err);
00251                                         if (!err || i<6)
00252                                                 object_error((t_object*)x, "Allocation error");
00253                                 }
00254                         }
00255                         else
00256                         {
00257                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"No data for Oracle %s declared", x->oname->s_name);
00258                         }
00259                 }
00260                 return x->obound;
00261         }

00271         void OMax_render_setname(t_OMax_render *x, t_symbol *s)
00272         {
00273                 x->oname = s;
00274                 x->obound = FALSE;
00275                 OMax_render_bind(x);
00276         }
00277         
00281         void OMax_render_read(t_OMax_render *x, long statnb)
00282         {
00283                 if (OMax_render_bind(x)&&(x->dataname->s_thing))
00284                 {
00285                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount));
00286                         if(!(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->wflag))
00287                         {
00288                                 if (x->data && (statnb>=0) && (statnb<(long)(x->data->get_size())))
00289                                 {
00290                                         O_label * labL = (*x->data)[statnb];
00291                                         
00292                                         // state number
00293                                         outlet_int(x->out_statenb, labL->get_statenb()); // output
00294                                         
00295                                         // date & duration
00296                                         atom_setlong(x->twout, labL->get_bufferef());
00297                                         atom_setlong(x->twout+1, labL->get_duration());
00298                                         outlet_list(x->out_buf, NULL, 2, x->twout); // output
00299                                         
00300                                         // section & phrase
00301                                         atom_setlong(x->twout, labL->get_section());
00302                                         atom_setlong(x->twout+1, labL->get_phrase());
00303                                         outlet_list(x->out_sectphr, NULL, 2, x->twout); // output
00304                                         
00305                                         // data
00306                                         switch(x->datatype)
00307                                         {
00308                                                 case LETTERS:
00309                                                 {
00310                                                         t_symbol * symout;
00311                                                         char carout[2];
00312                                                         *carout = ((O_char*)labL)->get_letter();
00313                                                         *(carout+1) = '\0';
00314                                                         symout = gensym(carout);
00315                                                         outlet_anything(x->out_data, symout,0,NULL); // output
00316                                                         break;
00317                                                 }
00318                                                 case MIDI_MONO:
00319                                                 {
00320                                                         atom_setlong(x->twout, ((O_MIDI_mono*)labL)->get_pitch());
00321                                                         atom_setlong(x->twout+1, ((O_MIDI_mono*)labL)->get_velocity());
00322                                                         outlet_list(x->out_data, NULL, 2, x->twout); // output
00323                                                         break;
00324                                                 }
00325                                                 case SPECTRAL:
00326                                                 {
00327                                                         outlet_int(x->out_data, ((O_spectral*)labL)->get_pitch()); // output pitch first
00328                                                         *x->coeflist = ((O_spectral*)labL)->get_coeffs();
00329                                                         list<float>::iterator it = x->coeflist->begin();
00330                                                         int coefi;
00331                                                         for (coefi = 0; coefi< x->nbcoeffs; coefi++)
00332                                                         {
00333                                                                 x->coeftab[coefi] = (*it);
00334                                                                 it ++;
00335                                                         }
00336                                                         atom_setfloat_array(x->nbcoeffs, x->coefout, x->nbcoeffs, x->coeftab);
00337                                                         outlet_list(x->out_data, NULL,x->nbcoeffs, x->coefout); // then output coeffs
00338                                                         break;
00339                                                 }
00340                                                 case MIDI_POLY:
00341                                                 {
00342                                                         // output notes of the slice
00343                                                         list<O_MIDI_note> notes = ((O_MIDI_poly*)labL)->get_notes();
00344                                                         list<O_MIDI_note>::iterator notit;
00345                                                         atom_setsym(x->coefout, gensym("note"));
00346                                                         for (notit=notes.begin();notit!=notes.end();notit++)
00347                                                         {
00348                                                                 atom_setlong(x->coefout+1, notit->get_pitch());
00349                                                                 atom_setlong(x->coefout+2, notit->get_velocity());
00350                                                                 atom_setlong(x->coefout+3, notit->get_channel());
00351                                                                 atom_setlong(x->coefout+4, notit->get_offset());
00352                                                                 atom_setlong(x->coefout+5, notit->get_duration());
00353                                                                 outlet_list(x->out_data, NULL,6, x->coefout); // then output coeffs
00354                                                         }
00355                                                         
00356                                                         // output slice data
00357                                                         atom_setsym(x->coefout, gensym("slice"));
00358                                                         atom_setlong(x->coefout+1, notes.size());
00359                                                         atom_setfloat(x->coefout+2, ((O_MIDI_poly*)labL)->get_vpitch());
00360                                                         atom_setfloat(x->coefout+3, ((O_MIDI_poly*)labL)->get_mvelocity());
00361                                                         outlet_list(x->out_data, NULL, 4, x->coefout); // output
00362                                                         
00363                                                         break;
00364                                                 }
00365                                         }
00366                                         outlet_bang(x->out_bang);
00367                                 }
00368                                 //else
00369                                 //object_post((t_object *)x,"State %ld outside Oracles bounds", statnb, x->oname->s_name);
00370                         }
00371                         else
00372                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Data of Oracle %s busy",x->oname->s_name);
00373                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount));
00374                 }
00375         }
00376         
00381         void OMax_render_phrases(t_OMax_render *x)
00382         {
00383                 if (OMax_render_bind(x)&&(x->dataname->s_thing))
00384                 {
00385                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount));
00386                         if(!(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->wflag))
00387                         {
00388                                 int i,size = x->data->get_size();
00389                                 int phrase = 0;//section = 0;
00390                                 O_label * finger;
00391                                 for (i=0; i<size; i++)
00392                                 {
00393                                         finger = (*x->data)[i];
00394                                         if (finger->get_phrase()!= phrase) 
00395                                         {       
00396                                                 // output state number
00397                                                 outlet_int(x->out_statenb, finger->get_statenb()); // output
00398                                                 
00399                                                 // output date
00400                                                 atom_setlong(x->twout, finger->get_bufferef());
00401                                                 outlet_list(x->out_buf, NULL, 1, x->twout); // output
00402                                                 
00403                                                 // output section & phrase
00404                                                 atom_setlong(x->twout, finger->get_section());
00405                                                 atom_setlong(x->twout+1, finger->get_phrase());
00406                                                 outlet_list(x->out_sectphr, NULL, 2, x->twout); // output
00407                                                 
00408                                                 // update phrase & section
00409                                                 phrase = finger->get_phrase();
00410                                                 //section = section;
00411                                         }
00412                                 }
00413                                 outlet_bang(x->out_bang);
00414                         }
00415                         else
00416                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Data of Oracle %s busy",x->oname->s_name);
00417                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&(((t_OMax_data *)(x->dataname->s_thing))->readcount));
00418                 }
00419                 
00420         }
00422 }
